entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 15 with temperature falling to 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 15 with temperature falling to 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
